original_title: My Biggest Distraction is That I Get Distracted
overview: The only thing more distracting than love, is the thought of love. You start to lose focus on what's important and you start making more bad decisions than you ever had before. It sounds like a dead end but you can bounce back if you realize what is more important, the uncertain future with someone or the good times that you're having now.
tagline: A man has seconds thoughts about his relationship after having frequent flashbacks of a woman from his past.
title: My Biggest Distraction is That I Get Distracted
